text: Jennifer Aniston is single and ready to mingle! We ’ ve got EXCLUSIVE details on why she doesn ’ t mind being a ‘ cougar ’ in her next relationship! It seems like only yesterday Jennifer Aniston, 49, and Justin Theroux, 46, ended their two year marriage. The couple confirmed their shocking split on Feb. 15, leaving the world devastated. However, being that the Just Go With It actress has had over a month to recover, she ’ s ready to hit the dating scene. But interestingly, she ’ s not looking to settle down. “ Jen doesn ’ t want to take her next relationship that seriously and just would like to have fun with someone without falling in love.
